column1: * 1925 - J.R.R. Tolkien writes Letter to H.F.B. Brett-Smith (22 July 1925).
* 1969 - Actor James Arnold Taylor is born.
* 2008 - The Lord of the Rings Online: The Lord of the Rings Online: Shadows of Angmar
column2: "The Ring-forges of Eregion" is released in North America.

column1: ** The funeral escort of Théoden leaves Minas Tirith
